title: iTuparAku
sahitya:
iTu parAku jEya nApai Emi nEramu rAma

anupallavi

 kuTila cittuDanucu cAlA kOpamutO nunnAvO

caraNam 1

 kaDigiyaina bhavasAgaramuna nannu paDadrOci
 kaTakaTam prAccu cunna kiTukEmi delupumayya

caraNam 2

parama bhakta shirOmaNi prahlAduni brOcitivi caraNamanina vibhISaNuniki rAjya mosagalEdA
prasanna shrIdhara sundara dharanija manOhara shrInivAsa varadAyaka birAna brOvakanE
